info.name: AutomationExerciseAPITestSuite
info.description:
# ðŸ§ª API Testing Collection â€“ AutomationExercise.com

This collection contains **manual API test cases** designed for the public API of [AutomationExercise.com](https://automationexercise.com).

## ðŸ” Purpose

To validate the core functionality, input handling, and response correctness of the available API endpoints across key modules.

## ðŸ“¦ Modules Covered

- ðŸ›ï¸ Products (List, Schema, Query Params)
    
- ðŸ·ï¸ Brands (List, Invalid Method)
    
- ðŸ” Search (Valid, Invalid, Edge Inputs)
    
- ðŸ” Authentication (Valid/Invalid Login, Validation Bugs)
    
- ðŸ‘¤ User Management (Register, Delete, Email Validation)
    

## ðŸ§ª Test Types

- âœ… Positive Tests
    
- âŒ Negative Tests
    
- âš ï¸ Edge Cases
    
- ðŸž Known Bugs
    

## ðŸ› ï¸ Structure

- Organized by module folders
    
- Each request includes a detailed description with:
    
    - Test Case ID
        
    - Title
        
    - Objective
        
    - Purpose
        
    - Method
        
    - Endpoint
        
    - Precondition
        
    - Test Steps
        
    - Expected Result
        
    - Test Data (if applicable)
        

## âš™ï¸ Notes

- Base URL: `https://automationexercise.com`
    
- Authentication is not required (public API)
    
- Includes sample test scripts (status check, field validation)
    
- Includes basic test scripts to validate HTTP status codes and JSON response content.
    

ðŸ“ Built to showcase professional API testing using Postman.  
Created by: **Sworup Dhungana**

item.name: Products

exec: // Check if the response body is not empty and is in JSON format.

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_PROD_01 â€“ Get All Products List

**Test Case ID:** TC_PROD_01  
**Title:** Get All Products List  
**Objective:** Return all products correctly  
**Purpose:** This endpoint retrieves a list of products available in the system. It is useful for clients looking to display product information on their platforms.  
**Method:** `GET`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/productsList`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Request Parameters:** None

**Test Steps:**

1. Send a GET request to `/api/productsList`
    
2. Validate response schema
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Response:
    

``` json
  "responseCode": 0,
  "products": [
    {
      "id": 0,
      "name": "",
      "price": "",
      "brand": "",
      "category": {
        "usertype": {
          "usertype": ""
        },
        "category": ""
      }
    }
  ]
}

 ```

### Additional Context

This endpoint is useful for applications that need to display a catalog of products to users, allowing for further filtering or selection based on the returned product data.

exec: pm.expect(body.message).to.eql("This request method is not supported.");

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_PROD_02 â€“ POST to Products List Rejected

**Test Case ID:** TC_PROD_02  
**Title:** POST to Products List Rejected  
**Objective:** Reject unsupported POST method on GET-only endpoint  
**Purpose:** Ensure API handles incorrect methods gracefully  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/productsList`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**ðŸ“¥ Test Data:**

```
{}

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send a POST request to `/api/productsList` with empty body
    
2. Observe response code
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 405 Method Not Allowed

item.name: TC_PROD_04 : GET product with invalid query param

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_PROD_04 â€“ GET Products with Invalid Query Params

**Test Case ID:** TC_PROD_04  
**Title:** GET Products with Invalid Query Params  
**Objective:** Ensure API ignores unexpected query parameters  
**Purpose:** Test API robustness with unknown inputs  
**Method:** `GET`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/productsList?foo=bar`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Test Steps:**

1. Send GET with key with Unknown param
    
2. Ensure response remains unaffected
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Unknown parameters ignored, valid product list returned

item.description:
Contains test cases for `/api/productsList`.

Covers product list retrieval, schema validation, unsupported methods, and response behavior for unknown query parameters.

item.name: Brands

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_BRAND_01 â€“ Get All Brands List

**Test Case ID:** TC_BRAND_01  
**Title:** Get All Brands List  
**Objective:** Return all brands correctly  
**Purpose:** Fetch all brand names available in the system  
**Method:** `GET`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/brandsList`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Test Steps:**

1. Send GET request to `/api/brandsList`
    
2. Validate brand array in response
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Array of brand names returned

exec: pm.expect(body.message).to.eql("This request method is not supported.");

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_BRAND_02 â€“ PUT to Brands List Rejected

**Test Case ID:** TC_BRAND_02  
**Title:** PUT to Brands List Rejected  
**Objective:** Reject unsupported PUT method on GET-only endpoint  
**Purpose:** Confirm method validation  
**Method:** `PUT`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/brandsList`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**ðŸ“¥ Test Data:**

``` json
{ "id": "44",
"brand":"nxt" 
}

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send PUT request with dummy brand
    
2. Observe status code
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 405 Method Not Supported

item.description:
Contains test cases for `/api/brandsList`.  
  
Focuses on brand list retrieval, handling of unsupported HTTP methods, and robustness against unexpected query parameters.

item.name: Search

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_SEARCH_01 â€“ Search Products with Valid Term

**Test Case ID:** TC_SEARCH_01  
**Title:** Search Products with Valid Term  
**Objective:** Return matching products for a valid search input  
**Purpose:** Verify that the search API correctly returns relevant product matches  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/searchProduct`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "search_product": "Lace Top For Women" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with a valid search term
    
2. Verify that the response contains matching products
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Response contains a list of products matching the search term

exec: pm.test("'products' key exists and is an array", () => {
// Check that 'products' is empty due to invalid input
pm.test("No products returned for invalid search input", () => {

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_SEARCH_03 â€“ Search With Special Characters

**Test Case ID:** TC_SEARCH_03  
**Title:** Search With Special Characters  
**Objective:** Ensure search handles special characters without crashing  
**Purpose:** Validate input robustness  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/searchProduct`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "search_product": "!@#$%" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with special characters in search term
    
2. Verify that API responds correctly without errors
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Response does not crash; empty or appropriate results returned

item.name: TC_SEARCH_04 : Search with very long term

exec: pm.test("'products' key exists and is an array", () => {
pm.test("No products returned for very long search string", () => {

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_SEARCH_04 â€“ Search With Very Long Term

**Test Case ID:** TC_SEARCH_04  
**Title:** Search With Very Long Term  
**Objective:** Test API behavior with long search input  
**Purpose:** Check input length validation and performance  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/searchProduct`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Request Body:**

StartFragment

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "search_product": "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa" }

 ```

(_256 characters 'a'_)

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with a very long search term
    
2. Observe response and check for errors or truncation
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Response returns empty list or appropriate validation error
    
- API should ideally limit input length (suggested improvement)

item.description:
Covers product search functionality via `/api/searchProduct`.  
  
Includes tests for valid searches, empty input, special characters, long strings, and no-match scenarios to validate API behavior and resilience.

item.name: Authentication
TC_AUTH_01: Verify login with valid details

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_AUTH_01 â€“ Login With Valid Credentials

**Test Case ID:** TC_AUTH_01  
**Title:** Login With Valid Credentials  
**Objective:** Authenticate user with valid email and password  
**Purpose:** Verify successful login functionality  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/verifyLogin`  
**Preconditions:** Valid user exists

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "email": "rocky1@gmail.com",
 "password": "admin123" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with valid credentials
    
2. Confirm success message and status
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Response indicates user exists and login success

item.name: TC_AUTH_02 : Verify Login with invalid details

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_AUTH_02 â€“ Login With Invalid Credentials

**Test Case ID:** TC_AUTH_02  
**Title:** Login With Invalid Credentials  
**Objective:** Reject login with incorrect password  
**Purpose:** Verify authentication failure handling  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/verifyLogin`  
**Preconditions:** User exists

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "email": "rocky1@gmail.com", "password": "admin" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with invalid password
    
2. Check failure message
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 404 Not Found or equivalent
    
- Response indicates user not found or authentication failure

item.name: TC_AUTH_06: Login with invalid email format

request.description:
StartFragment

#### ðŸ§ª TC_AUTH_06 â€“ Login With Invalid Email Format

**Test Case ID:** TC_AUTH_06  
**Title:** Login With Invalid Email Format  
**Objective:** Validate email format during login  
**Purpose:** Ensure email format validation on login API  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/verifyLogin`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "email": "rocky1", "password": "12345" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with invalid email format
    
2. Observe response code and message
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 400 Bad Request (expected)
    
- Actual: 404 Not Found (bug)
    
- Note: API incorrectly treats invalid email format as user not found; validation logic issue
    

EndFragment

item.description:
Tests for `/api/verifyLogin` endpoint.  
  
Validates login scenarios using valid and invalid credentials, malformed email formats, missing fields, and unsupported HTTP methods.

item.name: User Account

request.description:
StartFragment

#### ðŸ§ª TC_USER_01 â€“ Register New User Successfully

**Test Case ID:** TC_USER_01  
**Title:** Register New User Successfully  
**Objective:** Create a new user account with valid details  
**Purpose:** Verify successful user registration functionality  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/createAccount`  
**Preconditions:** Email is unused

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ 
  "name": "Tom Plank", 
  "email": "tomplank@gmail.com", 
  "password": "tom1234" 
}

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with valid user data
    
2. Confirm success response
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Response message: "User created"
    

EndFragment

StartFragment

#### ðŸ§ª TC_USER_02 â€“ Duplicate User Registration Rejected

**Test Case ID:** TC_USER_02  
**Title:** Duplicate User Registration Rejected  
**Objective:** Prevent registration with an email already in use  
**Purpose:** Validate unique email constraint for registration  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/createAccount`  
**Preconditions:** Email already exists

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "email": "tomplank@gmail.com" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with duplicate email
    
2. Verify error response
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 400 Bad Request
    
- Response message: "User already exist"
    

EndFragment

#### ðŸ§ª TC_USER_04 â€“ Delete User Account

**Test Case ID:** TC_USER_04  
**Title:** Delete User Account  
**Objective:** Successfully delete an existing user account  
**Purpose:** Verify user deletion endpoint functionality  
**Method:** `DELETE`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/deleteAccount`  
**Preconditions:** User account exists

**Request Body:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{ 
  "email": "tomplank@gmail.com", 
  "password": "tom1234" 
}

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send DELETE request with valid credentials
    
2. Confirm success response
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 204 No Content
    
- User is deleted successfully

item.name: TC_USER_05 : Register with invalid email format

request.description:
#### ðŸ§ª TC_USER_05 â€“ Register With Invalid Email Format

**Test Case ID:** TC_USER_05  
**Title:** Register With Invalid Email Format  
**Objective:** Reject registration attempts with improperly formatted emails  
**Purpose:** Validate email format on registration endpoint  
**Method:** `POST`  
**Endpoint:** `https://automationexercise.com/api/createAccount`  
**Preconditions:** API is up

**Request Body:**

``` json
jsonCopyEdit{ "email": "leviceke1@" }

 ```

**Test Steps:**

1. Send POST request with invalid email format
    
2. Verify error response
    

**Expected Result:**

- Status: 400 Bad Request (expected)
    
- Actual (bug): 201 Created (indicates missing validation)

item.description:
Includes test cases for user account actions such as registration, update, deletion, and detail fetching.  
  
Validates input handling, duplicate prevention, invalid formats, and exploratory edge cases.
